channel.title: Tutorialr.com
channel.description: Your online source for original tutorials covering a variety of topics

item.title: Setup and Start
item.description: Learn how to Setup and Start Visual Studio 2019

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Introduction to the Universal Windows Platform

item.title: Command Bar
item.description: Create standard-looking interface for applications for Universal Windows Platform

item.title: Data Input
item.description: Use InputScope for on-screen Keyboards and save and load application data for Universal Windows Platform

item.title: Image Rotate
item.description: Use Storyboard and DoubleAnimation to rotate an Image in the X, Y and X axis for Universal Windows Platform

item.title: Custom Dialog
item.description: How to use the ContentDialog to display a customised popup dialog for Universal Windows Platform

item.title: Navigation View
item.description: How to use NavigationView to display hamburger-style navigation for Universal Windows Platform

item.title: Drag and Drop
item.description: How to use a ListBox to create a simple drag-and-drop example for Universal Windows Platform

item.title: Photo Rotate
item.description: How to use BitmapTransform to create a simple image-rotating application for Universal Windows Platform

item.title: Input Dialog
item.description: How to create a ContentDialog that you can enter any text and display this for Universal Windows Platform

item.title: Access Keys
item.description: How use CommandBar with Alt key on Keyboard to show on-screen which Keyboard Key to press in Universal Windows Platform

item.title: Light Effect
item.description: How to create a PointLight Effect on an element in Universal Windows Platform

item.title: Shade Effect
item.description: How to create a Shadow Effect on an element in Universal Windows Platform

item.title: Acrylic Material
item.description: How to use Acrylic which is a feature of the Fluent Design System in Windows 10 for Universal Windows Platform

item.title: Reveal Highlight
item.description: How to use Reveal Highlight which is a feature of the Fluent Design System in Windows 10 for Universal Windows Platform

item.title: ParallaxView Effect
item.description: How to use ParallaxView Control which is part of the Fluent Design System in Windows 10 for Universal Windows Platform

item.title: Connected Animation
item.description: How to use Connected Animation which is part of the Fluent Design System in Windows 10 for Universal Windows Platform

item.title: Lucky Dice
item.description: How to use Grid to display a Dice with Random number of pips shown using Ellipse controls for Universal Windows Platform

item.title: Lucky Lotto
item.description: How to show selected Lottery Numbers in Ellipse controls within a StackPanel for Universal Windows Platform

item.title: Tic Tac Toe
item.description: How to create the game of Tic Tac Toe also known as Noughts and Crosses for Universal Windows Platform

item.title: Memory Game
item.description: How to create a simple memory game to pair moon phases for Universal Windows Platform

item.title: Lucky Roulette
item.description: How to create a Roulette game using Grid and Ellipse controls and see what number will be randomly selected for Universal Windows Platform

item.title: Lucky Bingo
item.description: How to create a Bingo game using Grid and Ellipse controls to display which balls have been drawn and which match a random ticket for Universal Windows Platform

item.title: Hit or Miss
item.description: How to create a simple random game where you can score a Hit or Miss based on which Button is clicked for Universal Windows Platform

item.title: Four in Row
item.description: How to create a simple two-player game where the objective is to get four pieces in a row in either horizontal, vertical or diagonal directions for Universal Windows Platform

item.title: Lucky Dominoes
item.description: How to create the look-and-feel of a Domino based game for Universal Windows Platform

item.title: Lucky Roshambo
item.description: How to create a Rock-Paper-Scissors also known as Roshambo for Universal Windows Platform

item.title: Cards Game
item.description: How to create the look-and-feel of a Playing Cards based game for Universal Windows Platform

item.title: Touch Game
item.description: How to create a touch-based pattern matching game for Universal Windows Platform

item.title: Fruit Game
item.description: How to create a simple random game to match three fruit-like symbols together for Universal Windows Platform

item.title: Light Game
item.description: How to create a simple game to toggle all the squares from Gold to Black for Universal Windows Platform

item.title: Order Game
item.description: How to create a simple game where the objective is to re-arrange numbered squares in the correct sequence in the quickest time possible for Universal Windows Platform

item.title: Sound Game
item.description: How to create a simple game to play sounds using a MediaElement with a provided frequency as an audio stream for Universal Windows Platform
